resources.string: Prof Gaurang Raval joined the Institute of Technology as Assistant Professor in Computer Science and Engineering Department in 2005. He has also served as Assistant Professor at U.V.Patel College of Engineering, Mehsana during 1998 to 2005. He pursued his B.E. and M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering from Birla Vishvakarma Mahavidyalaya, Sardar Patel University. He has completed doctoral studies from Nirma University in 2015. His area of interest is Distributed Computing and Wireless Sensor Networks. He has published several papers in International Journals and Conferences. He is also member of Academic Council of Nirma University. Currently, He is working as Associate Professor in Computer Science and Engineering Department.
